de.ityx.mediatrix.data.rule

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.rule.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rule.EmptyRule

    public class Rule
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Business rules are used to extend/change the default functionality of the application.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
